description: FOUR offers diversified exposure to Industry 4.0, including advanced robotics, augmented reality, cloud computing, cybersecurity, and the Internet of Things, providing investors with access to the performance of companies involved in the latest technological advancements and innovations shaping the future of manufacturing and industry. FOUR hedges the U.S. dollar exposure of the underlying assets back into Canadian dollars to the best of its ability. By equally weighting each of the five index categories, FOUR provides investors with diversified exposure across multiple segments of the Industry 4.0 landscape, potentially reducing concentration risk and enhancing long-term portfolio stability. FOUR seeks to replicate, to the extent possible, the performance of the Solactive Industry 4.0 Index, net of expenses. The Solactive Industry 4.0 Index is designed to provide exposure to the performance of equity securities of companies that are involved in the transformation of manufacturing and the industrial market through the development or implementation of new technologies and innovations. FOUR seeks to hedge the U.S. dollar value of its portfolio to the Canadian dollar at all times.
name: Global X Industry 4.0 Index ETF
